class_notes: In this course we will read, discuss and write about a variety of authentic texts in Hebrew. The texts we will read deal with different aspects of Israeli society. Every reading from the textbook will be complemented by further authentic materials such as newspaper articles, TV programs, etc., which will broaden our discussion. We will be engaged in reading, writing, discussions in class and listening comprehension. Alongside working on the different topics raised by the texts, we will also strengthen our knowledge of grammar.
course_description: Sixth in a series of courses designed to teach modern Hebrew, advanced study of grammar, vocabulary, and stylistics; intensive practice speaking and writing Hebrew.
sections: Class Nbr: 1608, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: P. Kahlon, Status: Open
